sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react'; import FiveStars from '../../assets/5-Star.svg'; import FourStars from '../../assets/4-Star.svg'; import ThreeStars from '../../assets/3-Star.svg'; import { ContainerFilter, ContainerPrice, TitlePrice, SubtitlePrice, ContainerRadio, Checkmark, CheckMarkRadio, Input, InputCheckmark, Line, ContainerValue, ContainerTextValue, NumberValue, ContainerCategory, ContainerCheckbox, ContainerRating, ContainerStars, Rating, ContainerButton, Button, FilterThumb, FilterTrack, StyledSlider, } from './styles'; const Filter = () => { const [ThumbValue, setThumbValue] = useState(0); return ( Preços R$10 R$10-$100 R$100-$500 R$500 Todos Valores {TrackValue} {ThumbValue} `Thumb value ${state.valueNow}`} renderThumb={(props, state) => {setThumbValue(state.valueNow)}} renderTrack={(props, state) => } pearling minDistance={100} /> Categorias Érico Rocha Desafio 6 em 7 Fórmula de lançamento KlickPages Audios Avaliação 8500 3250 1120 ); }; export default Filter;
